headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUBAN, MICHAEL C.

snippet: DUBAN--Michael C.,of Sarasota, FL, and White Plains, NY, corporate attorney died at 82 on March 17. He graduated University of Vermont and Brooklyn Law School. He is survived by his wife of 51 years, Roberta Rosen Duban, his adoring daughters Melissa Duban Goldberg, Lauren Duban, and grandsons Alex, Sam and Jake. A Memorial service to be held at Sharon Gardens, Valhalla, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DUBAN--Michael C.,of Sarasota, FL, and White Plains, NY, corporate attorney died at 82 on March 17. He graduated University of Vermont and Brooklyn Law School. A Memorial service to be held at Sharon Gardens, Valhalla, NY. 1/3
